Protected Attributes

MGImage m_image

Detailed Description

MGTextureImage defines the image data for OpenGL's glTexImage2D.

That is, the image size will be rounded to 2's power.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

MGTextureImage::MGTextureImage ( Gdiplus::Bitmap &  bitmap,
double  left,
double  bottom,
double  right,
double  top,
bool  scalable = true 
)
Parameters:
bitmap texture image data.
bottom texture coordinates of left and bottom point of the image.
top texture coordinates of right and top point of the image.
scalable indicates if the image can be scalabe or not. if scalable=false, (right, top) will be changed according to the expanded image area.
